title: We’re so excited about this Cyber Week deal: Own 2TB of this lifetime cloud storage
content:
Macworld

Keeping all your files accessible across multiple devices can be challenging, but it’s a whole lot easier if you have a unified cloud storage with enough room to dump everything you need.

FileJump is a practical solution with a lifetime 2TB storage plan, giving individuals and businesses a secure, easy way to store and share files, and throughout Cyber Week, it’s on sale for $69.97 (reg. $467), but not for much longer.

FukeJump’s user-friendly interface lets you upload media files, documents, and spreadsheets through a simple drag-and-drop dashboard, eliminating the hassle of complicated setups.

Need to find a specific file? FileJump has built-in media previews that allow you to open videos, images, and PDFs directly within the platform, so there’s no need to download files every time.

Collaboration is seamless—you can share files with clients or team members through links or set up free accounts for easy access. Security is a top priority, with AES encryption protecting your data throughout the process.

Whether you need to upload large project files or back up family photos, FileJump supports uploads up to 15GB per file. Accessible through desktop or mobile apps, it ensures your important data is always within reach, no matter where you are.

Don’t wait too long to act on this Cyber Week offer.

Grab this FileJump 2TB Cloud Storage lifetime subscription for just $69.97 while supplies last. This offer ends December 8 at 11:59 PM Pacific!
